name: Purposed Life, LLC
address: Gallatin, TN (Specific address not publicly available, but serves the Gallatin area)
category: Black-owned Cognitive behavioral therapy in Tennessee
description: This Black-owned practice, founded by Ben and Dr. Erica Roberts, offers mental, emotional, and social health services. name: Deandra Calvin, Licensed Professional Counselor, LPC-MHSP
address: Franklin, TN (Specific address not publicly available, but serves the Franklin area)
category: Black-owned Cognitive behavioral therapy in Tennessee

name: Vince Key, Licensed Clinical Social Worker (LCSW)
category: Black-owned Cognitive behavioral therapy in Tennessee
description: Vince Key specializes in working with adults dealing with anxiety, depression, PTSD, and men's issues. He uses Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) and Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT) to help clients achieve their therapeutic goals

name: Soulful Bloom Therapy
address: Nashville, TN (Specific address not publicly available, but serves the Nashville area)
